desc: 最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆確率で通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加

dictionary.lore: A special stone bearing the name of one of Ishgria's regions. Many demons perished in battle against Holy Emperor Karna Masta, and much was lost to finally seal him in this land. The concentrated and crystallized malice of these demons is thought to also rest somewhere in this land. The one who uncovers it shall be possessed with unspeakable rage against the gods, and augmented with incredible power.

name: 魔封珠『メノン』
